name: Space Forklift Sim
description:
It's your job to collect the cargo when it falls out of the space truck you work on. Use your Space-Forklift to return the loose cargo back to the cargo bay.

Controls:

WForward1Roll LeftA Left3Roll RightSBackEClamp CargoDRightFSpace BrakesShiftDownXFlight AssistSpaceUp

Left click to fire your Stasis pulse. Use that to stop rotation and velocity of loose cargo.

Holding right button allows you to look freely, then releasing the right button will target what you're looking at.

To clamp a piece of cargo you have to line it up directly in front of your lift. The indicators will show how close you are. You will hear a beep and see a little "E" next to the diamond when you are close enough to connect. Press "E" to clamp then "E" again when you want to release.
